TermDesc:
Synchronization Rate is capped at 200 points.
- Dealing damage with Normal Attack - Aemeath, Normal Attack - Mech and Resonance Skill Combo - Pierce: Armament Merge, and Combo - Pierce: Call of Dawn recovers Synchronization Rate.
- Casting Intro Skill Aria across the Endless Blue and Starborne Debut recovers 40 points of Synchronization Rate.
- Casting Resonance Liberation Heavenfall Edict - Overdrive recovers 30 points of Synchronization Rate.
- When in Instant Response, casting Heavy Attack - Aemeath and Heavy Attack - Mech recovers 100 points of Synchronization Rate. If Heavenfall Edict - Unboundis also active, additionally recover 100 points of Synchronization Rate.
